## Functions Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="void"
  name={<><a href="#ac2fc7f2c8237332f8b99c6e88af1b678">addIncomingValuesToPHIs</a> (MachineBasicBlock &#42;Successor, MachineBasicBlock &#42;OrigMBB, MachineBasicBlock &#42;NewMBB, MachineRegisterInfo &#42;MRI)</>}>
Given a basic block <code>Successor</code> that potentially contains PHIs, this function will look for PHIs that have an incoming value from <code>OrigMBB</code> and will add the same incoming value from <code>NewMBB</code>. <a href="#ac2fc7f2c8237332f8b99c6e88af1b678">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="void"
  name={<><a href="#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986">computeBranchTargetAndInversion</a> (unsigned CROp, unsigned BROp, bool UsingDef1, bool &amp;InvertNewBranch, bool &amp;InvertOrigBranch, bool &amp;TargetIsFallThrough)</>}>
Given a CR logical operation <code>CROp</code>, branch opcode <code>BROp</code> as well as a flag to indicate if the first operand of <code>CROp</code> is used as the SplitBefore operand, determines whether either of the branches are to be inverted as well as whether the new target should be the original fall-through block. <a href="#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Functions

### addIncomingValuesToPHIs() {#ac2fc7f2c8237332f8b99c6e88af1b678}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void addIncomingValuesToPHIs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; Successor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; OrigMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; NewMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42; MRI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a basic block <code>Successor</code> that potentially contains PHIs, this function will look for PHIs that have an incoming value from <code>OrigMBB</code> and will add the same incoming value from <code>NewMBB</code>.

NOTE: This should only be used if <code>NewMBB</code> is an immediate dominator of <code>OrigMBB</code>.

Definition at line <a href="#l00085">85</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp">PPCReduceCRLogicals.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### computeBranchTargetAndInversion() {#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void computeBranchTargetAndInversion (unsigned CROp, unsigned BROp, bool UsingDef1, bool &amp; InvertNewBranch, bool &amp; InvertOrigBranch, bool &amp; TargetIsFallThrough)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a CR logical operation <code>CROp</code>, branch opcode <code>BROp</code> as well as a flag to indicate if the first operand of <code>CROp</code> is used as the SplitBefore operand, determines whether either of the branches are to be inverted as well as whether the new target should be the original fall-through block.

Definition at line <a href="#l00267">267</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp">PPCReduceCRLogicals.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### splitMBB() {#a6268a1294b61555b575fbd131789aaf3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool splitMBB (<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo">BlockSplitInfo</a> &amp; BSI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Splits a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> to branch before <code>SplitBefore</code>.

The original branch is <code>OrigBranch</code>. The target of the new branch can either be the same as the target of the original branch or the fallthrough successor of the original block as determined by <code>BranchToFallThrough</code>. The branch conditions will be inverted according to <code>InvertNewBranch</code> and <code>InvertOrigBranch</code>. If an instruction that previously fed the branch is to be deleted, it is provided in <code>MIToDelete</code> and <code>NewCond</code> will be used as the branch condition. The branch probabilities will be set if the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebranchprobabilityinfo">MachineBranchProbabilityInfo</a> isn&#39;t null.

Definition at line <a href="#l00140">140</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp">PPCReduceCRLogicals.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### updatePHIs() {#ac47046162deb21d43512581afc16fa7c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void updatePHIs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; Successor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; OrigMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; NewMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42; MRI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a basic block <code>Successor</code> that potentially contains PHIs, this function will look for any incoming values in the PHIs that are supposed to be coming from <code>OrigMBB</code> but whose definition is actually in <code>NewMBB</code>.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> such PHIs will be updated to reflect reality.

Definition at line <a href="#l00056">56</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp">PPCReduceCRLogicals.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass aims to reduce the number of logical operations on bits in the CR</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register. These instructions have a fairly high latency and only a single</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pipeline at their disposal in modern PPC cores. Furthermore, they have a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// tendency to occur in fairly small blocks where there&#39;s little opportunity</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to hide the latency between the CR logical operation and its user.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given a basic block \\p Successor that potentially contains PHIs, this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">/// function will look for any incoming values in the PHIs that are supposed to</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Any such PHIs will be updated to reflect reality.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56" lineLink="#ac47046162deb21d43512581afc16fa7c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ac47046162deb21d43512581afc16fa7c">updatePHIs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06add2496ae8d635f9f169602771c88d376">Successor</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;OrigMBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NewMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06add2496ae8d635f9f169602771c88d376">Successor</a>-&gt;instrs()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given a basic block \\p Successor that potentially contains PHIs, this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">/// function will look for PHIs that have an incoming value from \\p OrigMBB</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">/// NOTE: This should only be used if \\p NewMBB is an immediate dominator of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p OrigMBB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="#ac2fc7f2c8237332f8b99c6e88af1b678"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ac2fc7f2c8237332f8b99c6e88af1b678">addIncomingValuesToPHIs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06add2496ae8d635f9f169602771c88d376">Successor</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Splits a MachineBasicBlock to branch before \\p SplitBefore. The original</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">/// branch is \\p OrigBranch. The target of the new branch can either be the same</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">/// as the target of the original branch or the fallthrough successor of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">/// original block as determined by \\p BranchToFallThrough. The branch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">/// conditions will be inverted according to \\p InvertNewBranch and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p InvertOrigBranch. If an instruction that previously fed the branch is to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be deleted, it is provided in \\p MIToDelete and \\p NewCond will be used as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the branch condition. The branch probabilities will be set if the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">/// MachineBranchProbabilityInfo isn&#39;t null.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="#a6268a1294b61555b575fbd131789aaf3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a6268a1294b61555b575fbd131789aaf3">splitMBB</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo">BlockSplitInfo</a> &amp;BSI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#aae359e559a78b42097a79266c811fc3e">allInstrsInSameMBB</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;All instructions must be in the same block.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;isSSA() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Can only do this while the function is in SSA form.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ThisMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a81626de817a0cb021ff8e915cf1942ed">succ&#95;size</a>() != 2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Don&#39;t know how to handle blocks that don&#39;t have exactly&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcinstrinfo">PPCInstrInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a> = MF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget">PPCSubtarget</a>&gt;().getInstrInfo();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OrigBROpcode = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#a3c6175f3cba584dfe3bbacd95ab5a5bd">OrigBranch</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InvertedOpcode =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">      OrigBROpcode == PPC::BC</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">          ? PPC::BCn</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">          : OrigBROpcode == PPC::BCn</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">                ? PPC::BC</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">                : OrigBROpcode == PPC::BCLR ? PPC::BCLRn : PPC::BCLR;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewBROpcode = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#a9de3800c0e12a80f9d768dc85bcf4d03">InvertNewBranch</a> ? InvertedOpcode : OrigBROpcode;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;OrigTarget = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#a3c6175f3cba584dfe3bbacd95ab5a5bd">OrigBranch</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a57e64b633278df75c699e6b98ce15031">getMBB</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;OrigFallThrough = OrigTarget == &#42;ThisMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a6321b189ea8fd5058663f8a87d6c23e9">succ&#95;begin</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           ? &#42;ThisMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#abd32ea34faf1cde285a1b8daccd9c167">succ&#95;rbegin</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           : &#42;ThisMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a6321b189ea8fd5058663f8a87d6c23e9">succ&#95;begin</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBRTarget =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">      BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#af48aeae6890b3963983bb7b556243a81">BranchToFallThrough</a> ? OrigFallThrough : OrigTarget;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It&#39;s impossible to know the precise branch probability after the split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// But it still needs to be reasonable, the whole probability to original</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// targets should not be changed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// After split NewBRTarget will get two incoming edges. Assume P0 is the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// original branch probability to NewBRTarget, P1 and P2 are new branch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// probabilies to NewBRTarget after split. If the two edge frequencies are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// same, then</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      F &#42; P1 = F &#42; P0 / 2            ==&gt;  P1 = P0 / 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      F &#42; (1 - P1) &#42; P2 = F &#42; P1     ==&gt;  P2 = P1 / (1 - P1)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> ProbToNewTarget, ProbFallThrough;     </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Prob for new Br.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> ProbOrigTarget, ProbOrigFallThrough;  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Prob for orig Br.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  ProbToNewTarget = ProbFallThrough = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a76e4454abb329dee28e8f525ddd1a210">BranchProbability::getUnknown</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">  ProbOrigTarget = ProbOrigFallThrough = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a76e4454abb329dee28e8f525ddd1a210">BranchProbability::getUnknown</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#ae46d495ef925c98479bd97816d79e426">MBPI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#af48aeae6890b3963983bb7b556243a81">BranchToFallThrough</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">      ProbToNewTarget = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#ae46d495ef925c98479bd97816d79e426">MBPI</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebranchprobabilityinfo/#ad78fb9b4721b71aa297bd2bda44e7e39">getEdgeProbability</a>(ThisMBB, OrigFallThrough) / 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">      ProbFallThrough = ProbToNewTarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#aaee6034264d5d0782e5d1489360730d9">getCompl</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">      ProbOrigFallThrough = ProbToNewTarget / ProbToNewTarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#aaee6034264d5d0782e5d1489360730d9">getCompl</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">      ProbOrigTarget = ProbOrigFallThrough.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#aaee6034264d5d0782e5d1489360730d9">getCompl</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">      ProbToNewTarget = BSI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/blocksplitinfo/#ae46d495ef925c98479bd97816d79e426">MBPI</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebranchprobabilityinfo/#ad78fb9b4721b71aa297bd2bda44e7e39">getEdgeProbability</a>(ThisMBB, OrigTarget) / 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">      ProbFallThrough = ProbToNewTarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#aaee6034264d5d0782e5d1489360730d9">getCompl</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given a CR logical operation \\p CROp, branch opcode \\p BROp as well as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a flag to indicate if the first operand of \\p CROp is used as the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">/// SplitBefore operand, determines whether either of the branches are to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">/// inverted as well as whether the new target should be the original</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fall-through block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267" lineLink="#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#aad66e8e7507fb8f6e69750b9bd157986">computeBranchTargetAndInversion</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CROp, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BROp, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UsingDef1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;InvertNewBranch, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;InvertOrigBranch,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;TargetIsFallThrough) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The conditions under which each of the output operands should be &#91;un&#93;set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can certainly be written much more concisely with just 3 if statements or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ternary expressions. However, this provides a much clearer overview to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reader as to what is set for each &lt;CROp, BROp, OpUsed&gt; combination.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BROp == PPC::BC || BROp == PPC::BCLR) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Regular branches.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CROp) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Don&#39;t know how to handle this CR logical.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPC::CROR:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">      InvertNewBranch = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">      InvertOrigBranch = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">      TargetIsFallThrough = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Looks through a COPY instruction to the actual definition of the CR-bit</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="comment">/// register and returns the instruction that defines it.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="comment">/// FIXME: This currently handles what is by-far the most common case:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="comment">/// an instruction that defines a CR field followed by a single copy of a bit</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from that field into a virtual register. If chains of copies need to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="comment">/// handled, this should have a loop until a non-copy instruction is found.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp-/ppcreducecrlogicals/#a24fbb3a26fc0fcefed74db2072222bb5"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp-/ppcreducecrlogicals/#a24fbb3a26fc0fcefed74db2072222bb5">PPCReduceCRLogicals::lookThroughCRCopy</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Reg,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">  Subreg = -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set the Subreg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CopySrc == PPC::CR0EQ || CopySrc == PPC::CR6EQ)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">  AllCRLogicalOps.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Contains all the implemented transformations on CR logical operations.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For example, a binary CR logical can be used to split a block on its inputs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a unary CR logical might be used to change the condition code on a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="comment">/// comparison feeding it. A nullary CR logical might simply be removable</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if the user of the bit it &#91;un&#93;sets can be transformed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPCReduceCRLogicals::handleCROp(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can definitely split a block on the inputs to a binary CR operation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// whose defs and (single) use are within the same block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">  CRLogicalOpInfo CRI = AllCRLogicalOps&#91;Idx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CRI.IsBinary &amp;&amp; CRI.ContainedInBlock &amp;&amp; CRI.SingleUse &amp;&amp; CRI.FeedsBR &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">      CRI.DefsSingleUse) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = splitBlockOnBinaryCROp(CRI);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Splits a block that contains a CR-logical operation that feeds a branch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and whose operands are produced within the block.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="comment">///    %vr5&lt;def&gt; = CMPDI %vr2, 0; CRRC:%vr5 G8RC:%vr2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="comment">///    %vr6&lt;def&gt; = COPY %vr5:sub&#95;eq; CRBITRC:%vr6 CRRC:%vr5</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="comment">///    %vr7&lt;def&gt; = CMPDI %vr3, 0; CRRC:%vr7 G8RC:%vr3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="comment">///    %vr8&lt;def&gt; = COPY %vr7:sub&#95;eq; CRBITRC:%vr8 CRRC:%vr7</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="comment">///    %vr9&lt;def&gt; = CROR %vr6&lt;kill&gt;, %vr8&lt;kill&gt;; CRBITRC:%vr9,%vr6,%vr8</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="comment">///    BC %vr9&lt;kill&gt;, &lt;BB#2&gt;; CRBITRC:%vr9</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Becomes:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="comment">///    %vr5&lt;def&gt; = CMPDI %vr2, 0; CRRC:%vr5 G8RC:%vr2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="comment">///    %vr6&lt;def&gt; = COPY %vr5:sub&#95;eq; CRBITRC:%vr6 CRRC:%vr5</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="comment">///    BC %vr6&lt;kill&gt;, &lt;BB#2&gt;; CRBITRC:%vr6</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="comment">///    %vr7&lt;def&gt; = CMPDI %vr3, 0; CRRC:%vr7 G8RC:%vr3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="comment">///    %vr8&lt;def&gt; = COPY %vr7:sub&#95;eq; CRBITRC:%vr8 CRRC:%vr7</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="comment">///    BC %vr9&lt;kill&gt;, &lt;BB#2&gt;; CRBITRC:%vr9</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPCReduceCRLogicals::splitBlockOnBinaryCROp(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp-/ppcreducecrlogicals/crlogicalopinfo">CRLogicalOpInfo</a> &amp;CRI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CRI.CopyDefs.first == CRI.CopyDefs.second) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unable to split as the two operands are the same\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumNotSplitIdenticalOperands++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CRI.TrueDefs.first-&gt;isCopy() || CRI.TrueDefs.second-&gt;isCopy() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">      CRI.TrueDefs.first-&gt;isPHI() || CRI.TrueDefs.second-&gt;isPHI()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unable to split because one of the operands is a PHI or &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;chain of copies.\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumNotSplitChainCopies++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: keep in sync with computeBranchTargetAndInversion().</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CROR &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">      CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CRNOR &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">      CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CRNAND &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal">      CRI.MI-&gt;getOpcode() != PPC::CRORC &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unable to split blocks on this opcode.\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumNotSplitWrongOpcode++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the branch instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">  MachineInstr &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mcid/#ab357441fcd1ea1f9b0d27c12700f6023a359237c780f7c8e40645575826da8a3c">Branch</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">    MRI-&gt;use&#95;nodbg&#95;begin(CRI.MI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg())-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We want the new block to have no code in it other than the definition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the input to the CR logical and the CR logical itself. So we move</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// those to the bottom of the block (just before the branch). Then we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will split before the CR logical.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">  MachineBasicBlock &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = SplitBefore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The instructions that need to be moved are not guaranteed to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: If one of the operands is a chain of (single use) copies, they</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FirstInstrToMove != SecondInstrToMove)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;We will &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; (InvertNewBranch ? </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;invert&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;copy&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">  BlockSplitInfo BSI &#123; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mcid/#ab357441fcd1ea1f9b0d27c12700f6023a359237c780f7c8e40645575826da8a3c">Branch</a>, SplitBefore, SplitCond, InvertNewBranch,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = <a href="#a6268a1294b61555b575fbd131789aaf3">splitMBB</a>(BSI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we&#39;ve split on a CR logical that is fed by a CR logical,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// recompute the source CR logical as it may be usable for splitting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Input1CRlogical =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">      CRI.TrueDefs.first &amp;&amp; isCRLogical(&#42;CRI.TrueDefs.first);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Input2CRlogical =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">      CRI.TrueDefs.second &amp;&amp; isCRLogical(&#42;CRI.TrueDefs.second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Input1CRlogical)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal">      AllCRLogicalOps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp-/ppcreducecrlogicals/#ae5e50a6a8cb928fb34cd4fde19384381">createCRLogicalOpInfo</a>(&#42;CRI.TrueDefs.first));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Input2CRlogical)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal">      AllCRLogicalOps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp-/ppcreducecrlogicals/#ae5e50a6a8cb928fb34cd4fde19384381">createCRLogicalOpInfo</a>(&#42;CRI.TrueDefs.second));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPCReduceCRLogicals::collectCRLogicals() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MachineBasicBlock &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> : &#42;MF) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MachineInstr &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isCRLogical(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">        AllCRLogicalOps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcreducecrlogicals-cpp-/ppcreducecrlogicals/#ae5e50a6a8cb928fb34cd4fde19384381">createCRLogicalOpInfo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">        TotalCRLogicals++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AllCRLogicalOps.back().IsNullary)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">          TotalNullaryCRLogicals++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AllCRLogicalOps.back().IsBinary)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">          TotalBinaryCRLogicals++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">          TotalUnaryCRLogicals++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
